assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: Ensemble work. Roles in the ensemble, different instruments. Arranging.
description.et: Ansamblitöö. Rollid ansamblis, erinevad pillid. Seadete tegemine.

objectives.en: To develop and put into practice basic skills necessary to lead a band or small ensemble. To learn, how to make simple arrangements for ensemble.
objectives.et: Ansambli juhendamiseks vajalike baasoskuste rakendamise oskuste omandamine. Lihtsamate pilliseadete tegemise oskuse omandamine.

learning_outcomes.en: * is able to lead a band or small ensemble;
* is able to prepare scores necessary for rehearsals;
* is able to plan and conduct rehearsals;
learning_outcomes.et: *on suuteline ette valmistama ja läbi viima proove ansamblitega

learning_outcomes.en: * can describe processual dynamics of rehearsals;
* is able to make simple arrangements.
